title: Hot White Chocolate
ingredients: 3 oz best quality white chocolate, chopped
directions: Combine milk and vanilla in sauce pan. Bring to a simmer.
Remove vanilla bean. Add hot milk to the blender and carefully blend until frothy.
Add the white chocolate to the blend until the chocolate is melted.
Divide between two mugs. Top with dollop of whipped cream and sprinkle with cocoa powder.
